text: Wyśmierzyce is a town in Białobrzegi County, Masovian Voivodeship, Poland. In 2004, 884 people lived there. It lies along National Road Nr. 48, on the right, southern bank of the Pilica River. Historically Wyśmierzyce belongs to the province of Lesser Poland, and is on the border with Mazovia. == Other websites == *Official town and commune webpage * Jewish Community in Wyśmierzyce on Virtual Shtetl Category:Towns in Masovian Voivodeship
title: Wyśmierzyce
